elements.text:
As you're getting into the shower, you see a huge spider on the wall. You turn away for a second and look back and realize it's gone. 

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I want to scream, but instead gently move the spider outside.
I leave the bathroom immediately and don't take a shower.
I go on with my bathroom routine.
I want to run away, but decide to stay and face my fears.
I put on my favorite song and hop in the shower.
